row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 10)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 11)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 13)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
col_desc: Queen has one lip sync win.
Queen has two mini challenge wins.
Queen has zero lip sync wins.
